title.rendered: The Most Glamorous New Year’s Eve 2024 in the City

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Don something sparkly, because you’re in for Hollywood star-style glamour. Red carpet, chilled bubbly, an excellent entertainment band, a Piano & Cognac lounge, midnight waltzing, a children’s disco for your youngest – at the Esplanade, a superb time is guaranteed. Selection of fine dishes created by awarded Chef Ana Grgić Tomić are a special gourmet experience – on New Year’s Eve, you will be welcomed with delicacies such as supreme Oscietra caviar, lamb tartare, lobster, scampi and foie gras. Welcome 2024 in the best possible way – after a cheerful night, snuggle up in a sumptuous room between fragrant sheets and experience a magical morning with a view of Zagreb, with by far the best breakfast in town.

For the craziest night of the year, book a table for yourself and your crew, put on your party outfit, and join a spectacular celebration in the festive atmosphere of the iconic Esplanade Zagreb Hotel.

New Year’s Eve in the grand Emerald Ballroom and the elegant Zinfandel’s is planned down to the smallest detail, with a great party guaranteed. From the red carpet, premium welcome bubbly with delicious snacks, an elegant six-course gourmet dinner, all the way to a musical programme with lots of dancing and joy – nothing is left to chance at Esplanade.

The selection of dishes is entrusted to the experienced Ana Grgić Tomić, famous Croatian awarded Chef, who with her team will prepare a selection of the finest delicacies for New Year’s Eve, such as lamb tartare with Pag cheese gel and olive powder, lobster with Oscietra Caviar, crispy kataifi and citrus fruit aioli, scampi with Jerusalem artichoke and fried hazelnut foam, foie gras with homemade brioche, port sauce and pear marmalade, Sorbeto, beef cheeks with black trumpet ragout, truffles and shallot marmalade, Madeline with dark chocolate, pistachio ganache and pearls with peppered raspberry – these are only a part of the New Year’s gala menu. In addition, at midnight count down to the new year with sparkling wine and a deliciously comforting wine stew.

This year, an excellent show band Vizija is preparing a spectacular combination of top music and performances with the addition of light effects and other surprises. An ideal combination of classics, jazz numbers, waltzes, a magnificent atmosphere, top service, and irresistible delicacies will surely make this celebration the best in town.

And if you would like to take a break from dancing, the Esplanade has prepared its Piano & Cognac Lounge, furnished with comfortable sofas and a bar – perfect to relax in with some premium cognac and cigars, to the beat of light piano music.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space]

[vc_column_text]

While you are having a good time, a super-cheerful team of animators under expert guidance will usher your little ones into the new year at the children’s disco party, with games and dancing. Your youngest ones can expect a specially decorated space, having fun with their peers, games, music for dancing, and an abundance of surprises. And when the little ones get tired of playing and dancing, they will also have a cool place to relax and sleep.

Welcome the new 2024 year in the best possible way – after a cheerful night, snuggle up in a sumptuous room between fragrant sheets and experience a magical morning with a view of Zagreb and by far the best breakfast in town. Replenish your energy with irresistible delicacies at breakfast – eggs Benedict, eggs Royale, poached eggs on crispy toast with avocado and pancetta, hot oatmeal with cinnamon, honey, and vanilla, pancakes with berries, French toast with maple syrup or the delicious Esplanade štrukli with freshly squeezed orange juice, premium Croatian sparkling wine to toast the New Year or Bloody Mary to cure the hangover – you’ll wish you could start each and every day just like this.

The price of the reception with the evening program is 290 € ∙ 2185 HRK per person and includes welcome sparkling wine with delicious snacks, a six-course gala dinner, unlimited consumption of selected wines, sparkling wine at midnight, replenishing stew, and special props for the celebration.

The reception price for children (aged 4-10 years) is 155 € ∙ 1167,84 HRK per child and includes a sumptuous buffet menu, children’s sparkling wine at midnight, and unlimited consumption of juices and water. The offer is available for parents staying at the hotel or planning to attend a New Year’s Eve reception on one of the hotel’s premises.

The price of accommodation depends on the room category on the day of stay.

The New Year’s package with one overnight stay in the Superior Room is 789 € ∙ 5944,72 HRK for two people with New Year’s Eve dinner at Zinfandel’s or at the Emerald Ballroom. The package is subject to availability on 31 December 2023. It is possible to upgrade your room category (Deluxe, Junior, Deluxe Suite, and Esplanade Suite) or add an extra night in the hotel at an additional charge. The price includes VAT. Tourist tax in the amount of €1.59 per person per day is not included in the package price.

For more information visit www.esplanade.hr (under Christmas & New Year). To reserve a table and accommodation, contact the Esplanade’s event organisation team at xmas@esplanade.hr or by phone at 00 385 1 45 66 035 or 00 385 1 45 666 66.

IMAGES DOWNLOAD:  Esplanade doček Nove 2024

(Esplanade Zagreb hotel Archive/Lili Bašić/Sandro Sklepić/Goran Jakuš)

 

[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
